name: robotBreakout
description:
try to scape an evil factory full of evil robots as a good robot!what is the game about?

the game is about using your platforming skills and shooting abilities  to find a way to get out of each room/level in the game.

Controls:

you can shoot your enemies (by pressing or holding mouse's left button) and you can use your shield to avoid getting shot at(by holding mouse's right button)  and in order to move around you need to use "a" and "d" keys or use "right arrow" and "left arrow" keys and in order to jump simply press space.

Main objective:

in order to finish each level you need to get to the door with the exit sine
